cleaned_text: Recovery Acupuncture Group The group protocol of the National Acupuncture Detoxification Association (NADA) is used to alleviate symptoms of post-acute withdrawal syndrome, anxiety, sleeplessness, and to support ongoing recovery management. Full treatment takes about 45 minutes. Licensed Acupuncturist, Kathy Duggan, has many years experience and has been providing this opportunity for South Shore Peer Recovery since 2015. Offered Wednesday evenings at 6:00pm the Center. This program meets: September 13 @ 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm [Recovery Acupuncture](https://southshorepeerrecovery.org/event/detox-acupuncture-2/2023-09-13/) September 20 @ 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm [Recovery Acupuncture](https://southshorepeerrecovery.org/event/detox-acupuncture-2/2023-09-20/) September 27 @ 6:00 pm
